document_data.name: Grisella
document_data.mainbody: '''Grisella''' was the owner of the [[Winter's Cradle Tavern]] in [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: The bartender was a large woman who wore dull gray outfits.
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Grisella had an infestation of [[beetle]]s in the cellar of her tavern.
